name: I Am A I
summary: I AM A I is a cartoony, third-person, open level design, sandbox assassin game. In case that description sounds like some corporate gaming-industry gobbledygook, imagine if Nintendo produced a Hitman game. You play as a small robot that is capable of wielding (as of right now) over 100 unique items and are tasked to assassinate one main target and execute dozens of challenges per level.
